title: Player help
body:
Dear officer:

I'm sorry for I forgot to answer your questions.
I didn't share my accounts with any others.
Like you said , my flash was change in D/F,and now I pretty sure that we have some mistake on it. Now I see the problem, if you have read my history matcha you might find out the date is different , i was busy on my study, but the date shows me I'm still in the game, which mean some one knows my account, but have to said I didn't tell any one my account. People will not read the history match when they login to the game,they read the store pages first. So I have no idea for that as well. Cause change in D/F to me some time is like I'm play riven D is flash and F is tp . So that is the issues. What else can I do to fix this. I mean can u please help me out? Or Anything I need to work with you to unlock my account ? If you read this let me know please.

Regard

replies.body:
Hey man,

Just before I answer your question let's clear this up first. The people who replied to your [previous post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/lUR2PlEX-this-account-has-been-permanently-suspended) were just ordinary players. They just assumed you were banned for elo boosting, none of them actually knew for sure.

I'm an emissary. We're part of a group of board volunteers who help with issues like yours.

> **Anyway, on to your answer:**
> 
> You said you received a notification saying _"This account has been permanently suspended."_ That could mean anything, not just elo boosting.

> You have to go contact [**Riot Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask them why you were banned. Use the link I have attached to do that.

I hope this helps. Feel free to reply if you encounter any problems ;)

Hello my friend,

They sent me back a email says I used the hacks things, but I'm not!  I don't even know lol has hacks thing!  That is very weak, man! They just tell me like Yo ! Our system found out that you were using hacks things, we have to ban your account.  ????  I'm just like "Sorry what did you said????"   People standing here for a reason. And me , I just want the truth and the justices.

That's something you'll have to sort out with them sadly, I'm not really qualified to help here. If **Riot** bans someone they always make sure that they're 100% sure scripting has occurred.

If you say it definitely wasn't you, then chances are your account has been compromised at some point and a player ran scripts on it.
